Mohawk College Application Requirements, Supporting Documents Requirements , How  to make payment to Mohawk College ,English Language Requirements.

Mohawk College Admission is ongoing for all students who are interested in applying; the admission is open for all nationals:

Mohawk College Admission Requirements

To avoid delays, include all requested credentials, including:

Supporting Documents Required for Mohawk College Admission

  • A make a copy of of the picture and address pages of your passport
  • Translated and notarized transcripts from your high school (secondary school) and higher education institute (if valid).
  • Official IELTS / TOEFL result or English grade 12 credits from a Canadian secondary school if authorized.
  • Translated and notarized Diploma(s) /Degree(s) from your high school.
  • A non refundable $100 CAD application fee (see the steps below)
  • Applicants in Canada only must include:
  • A copy of your valid study permit
  • evidence of number present from a different institution (LOA and /or transcript ),and
  • A non refundable $2,200 tuition deposit (first semester tuition fee balance to be paid within 20 days of receiving Letter of Acceptance).
  • All of the above documentation should collect into one PDF file.

How to make payment to Mohawk College

Step 1: Find your institution;

  • Begin by accessinghttps://www.flywire.com/select-institution
  • Begin by accessing ,Enter the name of the institution you want to pay ,or select them from the drop down menu
  • If you do not see your institution listed ,kindly access the payment page  through a link sent in your most recent invoice or in your student account if you are paying an educational institution

Step 2: input your country and payment sum:

  • Once you have selected the intuition, enter the country that your payment is coming from and the amount you wish to pay
  • Click “NEXT” to continue .you will then see all of the payment methods that Flywire offers for payments from your country to your institution.

Step 3: Select your payment method

Step 4: Enter the payer’s information

  • input the payers personal details .the payer information should include the information of the account or card holder who is making the payment on your behalf
  • Agree to Flywire’s terms and conditions by checking the box at the bottom of the form
  • Click on next to continue

Steps 5: enter the payment information

  • Fill in the information required by your institution
  • Enter the contact information and your intuition
  • Select continue to proceed

Step 6: Review and confirm your information

  • Review the payer and the payment information for accuracy. Use the previous button if you would like to edit your information
  • Click on pay to continue

Step 7: For bank transfer payments

  • Review payment instructions (including Flywire bank details) will be automatically displayed
  • You can also download a duplicate of these directives in a PDF document. Please note that we will not ask for your bank account information

Step 8: For credit payment

  • Enter your card number, name, expiration date, and security code
  • Input your information in 15 minute before the session times out
  • Click ‘make payment’ to continue.

Step 9 – For online process:

  • Log in with your credentials to the select online process
  • Follow the directions to complete your sum.
  • Lastly click here to start payment
